languages.text: {n}Усталый, измотанный страданиями разум астропата угасает быстро и с охотой, и потусторонний ужас, прячущийся в тенях, развеивается. Демоны, терзавшие Заккари Вайса, более не властвуют в этой капелле.{/n}

{n}The Choirmaster's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Усталый, измотанный страданиями разум астропата угасает быстро и с охотой, и потусторонний ужас, прячущийся в тенях, развеивается. Демоны, терзавшие Заккари Вайса, более не властвуют в этой капелле.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Weary of its suffering, the Astropath's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows is dissipated. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

{n}Weary of its suffering, the Astropath's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows is dissipated. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

{n}The Astropath's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

{n}The Astropath's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

{n}The Choirmaster's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

{n}The Choirmaster's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La mente del maestro del Coro desaparece rápidamente, con impaciencia, agotada por el sufrimiento, y el horror sobrenatural que acecha en las sombras se disipa con ella. Los daemons que acosaban a Zacchary Weisz ya no controlan esta capilla.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La mente del maestro del Coro desaparece rápidamente, con impaciencia, agotada por el sufrimiento, y el horror sobrenatural que acecha en las sombras se disipa con ella. Los daemons que acosaban a Zacchary Weisz ya no controlan esta capilla.{/n}

languages.text: {n}思い悩んでボロボロになったクワイアーマスターの心は、心待ちにしていたかのようにサーッと軽くなり、影に潜む異界の恐怖は散ってなくなる。もはや、この礼拝堂で一番力を持つのは、ザッカリー・ワイズに取り憑いていたディーモンではない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}思い悩んでボロボロになったクワイアーマスターの心は、心待ちにしていたかのようにサーッと軽くなり、影に潜む異界の恐怖は散ってなくなる。もはや、この礼拝堂で一番力を持つのは、ザッカリー・ワイズに取り憑いていたディーモンではない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}唱诗大师痛苦而疲惫的意识骤然消逝，潜伏在阴影之中的恐怖之物也随之消散。纠缠扎卡里·威茨的恶魔烟消云散，礼拜堂里已经再也没有恶魔的身影了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}唱诗大师痛苦而疲惫的意识骤然消逝，潜伏在阴影之中的恐怖之物也随之消散。纠缠扎卡里·威茨的恶魔烟消云散，礼拜堂里已经再也没有恶魔的身影了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Verstand des Chormeisters verblasst schnell und bereitwillig, müde vom Leid, und der andersweltliche Schrecken, der in den Schatten lauert, löst sich auf. Die Dämonen, die Zacchary Weisz heimgesucht haben, herrschen nicht mehr über diese Kapelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Verstand des Chormeisters verblasst schnell und bereitwillig, müde vom Leid, und der andersweltliche Schrecken, der in den Schatten lauert, löst sich auf. Die Dämonen, die Zacchary Weisz heimgesucht haben, herrschen nicht mehr über diese Kapelle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Las de souffrir, l'esprit du maître de chœur s'évanouit rapidement, impatiemment, et l'horreur surnaturelle tapie dans les ombres se dissipe à son tour. Les démons qui hantaient Zacchary Weisz ont fini de régner en maîtres sur cette chapelle.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Las de souffrir, l'esprit du maître de chœur s'évanouit rapidement, impatiemment, et l'horreur surnaturelle tapie dans les ombres se dissipe à son tour. Les démons qui hantaient Zacchary Weisz ont fini de régner en maîtres sur cette chapelle.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Koro Şefi'nin zihni, çektiği acılardan bitkin düşmüş bir hâlde süratle ve hevesle güçten düşüyor. Gölgelerde sinsice gezinen, başka bir dünyaya ait dehşetler ise dağılıyor. Zacchary Weisz'a musallat olan iblisler, artık bu şapele hükmetmiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Choirmaster's mind fades swiftly and eagerly, weary from suffering, and the otherworldly horror lurking in the shadows dissipates. No longer do the daemons who haunted Zacchary Weisz reign supreme in this chapel.{/n}
